metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5158 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in vringh_kiov_advance in drivers/vhost/vringh.c in the host side of a virtio ring in the Linux Kernel. This issue may result in a denial of service from guest to host via zero length descriptor.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5158` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-13-generic - 6.5.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic - 6.5.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic-64k - 6.5.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-aws - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-azure - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
